roleset.name: come to rest again
roleset.note: RESETTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'resettle' based on frames file for 'settle'. (from resettle.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: entity causing something to settle again

example.name: I am getting so tired of stock reports
example.text: On the Commodity Exchange in New York, gold for current delivery resettled at $374.20 an ounce, down 50 cents.

example.name: start a settlement
example.text: The town was resettled [*]-9 by six different Lin and Shan families.
example.arg: by six different Lin and Shan families

example.name: causative
example.text: Certainly, the Oct 13 sell-off didn't resettle any stomachs.
